TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ControlBuilder extends System.Object

summary.span: 支持页分析器生成控件及其包含的子控件。

span.span: Supports the page parser in building a control and the child controls it contains.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，在页面上的每个控件都与默认关联类。By default, every control on a page is associated with a default class. 分析过程中，ASP.NET 页框架生成的树对应于页的控件的树的对象。During parsing, the ASP.NET page framework builds a tree of objects corresponding to the tree of controls for the page. 树然后用于生成页代码以创建管理树。The tree is then used to generate page code to create the control tree. 子控件，除了定义如何分析控件标记中的内容的行为。In addition to child controls, the defines the behavior of how the content within control tags is parsed. 可以通过定义您自己的自定义控件生成器类来覆盖此默认行为。You can override this default behavior by defining your own custom control builder class. 这通过应用属性设为你的控件生成器类，如下所示：This is done by applying a attribute to your control builder class as follows: `[ControlBuilderAttribute(typeof(ControlBuilderType))]` ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建生成表时定义其属性和内容的控件。The following code example creates a control whose attributes and content are defined at the time the table is built. 下面是命令行要用于生成可执行文件。The following is the command line to use to build the executable. ```vb vbc /r:System.dll /r:System.Web.dll /r:System.Drawing.dll /t:library /out:myWebAppPath/Bin/vb_mycontrolbuilder.dll myControlBuilder.vb ``` ```csharp csc /t:library /out:myWebAppPath/Bin/cs_mycontrolbuilder.dll myControlBuilder.cs ``` [!code-csharp[SystemWebUI_ControlBuilder_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_ControlBuilder_2/CS/controlbuilder.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SystemWebUI_ControlBuilder_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_ControlBuilder_2/VB/controlbuilder.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例使用上一个自定义控件。The following code example uses the previous custom control. 具体而言，它生成表其属性和内容都在运行时定义。In particular, it builds a table whose attributes and content are defined at run time. 请注意在指令中显示的值反映在上述命令行。Notice that the values shown in the directive reflect the previous command line. [!code-aspx-csharp[SystemWebUI_ControlBuilder_2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_ControlBuilder_2/CS/controlbuilder.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[SystemWebUI_ControlBuilder_2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_ControlBuilder_2/VB/controlbuilder.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建的新实例类。Use this constructor to create a new instance the class. > [!NOTE] > 分析页面时通常由 ASP.NET 使用此构造函数和创建的控件层次结构。This constructor is generally used by ASP.NET when parsing the page and creating the control hierarchy. 它不用于在代码中使用。It is not intended for use in your code.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool AllowWhitespaceLiterals() cil managed
Public Overridable Function AllowWhitespaceLiterals () As Boolean

summary.span: 确定在控件的开始和结束标记之间的内容中是否允许存在空白。

span.span: Determines whether white space literals are permitted in the content between a control's opening and closing tags.

summary.span: 此方法由 ASP.NET 页面框架调用。

span.span: This method is called by the ASP.NET page framework.
Always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于确定是否之间开始标记和结束标记的控件的内容中允许存在空白。The method is used to determine whether white space literals are permitted in the content between the opening and closing tags of a control. 如果此方法返回`false`，由页分析器处理内容之前，将内容从削减的空白文本。When this method returns `false`, the white space literals are trimmed from the content before the content is processed by the page parser. 如果此方法返回`true`，未删除的空白文本。When this method returns `true`, the white space literals not removed. 此方法在分析过程中由 ASP.NET 页面框架调用，但不可直接在代码中调用。This method is called by the ASP.NET page framework during parsing and is not intended to be called directly in you code. ## Examples [!code-csharp[ControlBuilderSamples_1#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlBuilderSamples_1/CS/ctrlbuilder_1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ControlBuilderSamples_1#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlBuilderSamples_1/VB/ctrlbuilder_1.vb#4)]

para.span: 你可以指示是否在你自定义控件中允许存在空白派生类中重写此方法。

span.span: You can override this method in your derived class to indicate whether white space literals are permitted in your custom control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AppendLiteralString(string s) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub AppendLiteralString (s As String)

param.name: s
param.span: 要添加到控件的内容。

span.span: The content to add to the control.

summary.span: 将指定的文本内容添加到控件。

span.span: Adds the specified literal content to a control.

summary.span: 此方法由 ASP.NET 页面框架调用。

span.span: This method is called by the ASP.NET page framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写处理方法可控制如何文本内容控件的开始和结束标记之间。Override the method to control how literal content between the control's opening and closing tags is processed. 文本内容可以是任何浏览器由传递给服务器控件的文本。Literal content can be any text that is passed by the browser to the server control. 例如，任何 HTML 元素和其开始和结束标记之间的文本，都是文本内容。For example, any HTML elements and text, between their opening and closing tags, are literal content. ## Examples [!code-csharp[ControlBuilderSamples_1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlBuilderSamples_1/CS/ctrlbuilder_1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[ControlBuilderSamples_1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlBuilderSamples_1/VB/ctrlbuilder_1.vb#3)]

span.span: The string literal is not well formed.

public: property System::Web::UI::IFilterResolutionService ^ CurrentFilterResolutionService { System::Web::UI::IFilterResolutionService ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个 对象，在设计器中分析和保持控件时使用该对象管理与设备筛选器相关的服务。

span.span: Gets an object that is used to manage device-filter related services when parsing and persisting controls in the designer.

value.span: 一个 对象，在设计器中分析和保持控件时使用该对象管理与设备筛选器相关的服务。

span.span: An object that is used to manage device filter related services when parsing and persisting controls in the designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口是特定于控件的设计器中使用设备筛选器的方式的接口。The interface is an interface that is specific to how a control uses device filters in a designer. 当分析或在浏览器请求，上下文以外的设计器中保持控件提供一种方法来确定是否当前控件受指定的筛选器和指定的筛选器是否为特定的设备筛选器的一部分层次结构。When controls are parsed or persisted in the designer outside the context of a browser request, the provides a way to determine whether the current control is affected by a named filter and whether a named filter is part of a specific device-filter hierarchy.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool HtmlDecodeLiterals() cil managed
Public Overridable Function HtmlDecodeLiterals () As Boolean

summary.span: 确定 HTML 控件的字符串是否必须是 HTML 解码的。

span.span: Determines whether the literal string of an HTML control must be HTML decoded.

summary.span: 此方法由 ASP.NET 页面框架调用。

span.span: This method is called by the ASP.NET page framework.

returns.span: 如果要解码 HTML 控件字符串，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the HTML control literal string is to be decoded; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文字字符串是指开始标记和结束标记的 HTML 控件之间的文本。A literal string refers to the text between the opening and closing tag of an HTML control. HTML 编码是将文本转换为的浏览器将显示，而将解释为 HTML 的字符串表示形式时。HTML encoding is when text is converted into a string representation that the browser will display rather than interpret as HTML. 字符如问题标记 （？）、 and 符 (&)、 斜杠标记 （/） 和空格可能截断或损坏某些浏览器，因此中出现时，这些字符必须经过编码`a`标记或查询字符串中。Characters such as the question mark (?), ampersand (&), slash mark (/), and spaces might be truncated or corrupted by some browsers, so those characters must be encoded when they appear in `a` tags or in query strings. 方法在分析过程中由 ASP.NET 页面框架调用，但不适合直接在代码中调用。The method is called by the ASP.NET page framework during parsing and is not intended to be called directly in you code. ## Examples 下面的示例重写方法，以便允许 HTML 解码的文本字符串在此生成器应用于任何控件中。The following example overrides the method to allow HTML decoding of literal strings in any control this builder is applied to. [!code-csharp[ControlBuilderSamples_2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlBuilderSamples_2/cs/ctrlbuilder1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ControlBuilderSamples_2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlBuilderSamples_2/VB/ctrlbuilder1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例使用属性时调用方法。The following example uses the property when the method is called. 当控件将附加到它，此生成器方法确定控件是否正在访问在设计时通过设计器。When a control has this builder attached to it, the method determines whether the control is being accessed at design-time through a designer. 返回的值属性，然后调用方法。The returns the value of the property, and then the method is called. 如果属性设置为`false`、引发。If the property is set to `false`, an is thrown. 否则，在返回该控件的内部文本调用。Otherwise, the inner text of the control is returned on the call. The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内部文本是控件的开始标记和结束标记之间的文本。The inner text is the text between the opening and closing tags of the control. 此方法在分析过程中由 ASP.NET 页面框架调用，但不可直接在代码中调用。This method is called by the ASP.NET page framework during parsing and is not intended to be called directly in you code. ## Examples 下面的示例使用属性时调用方法。The following example uses the property when the method is called. 当控件将附加到它，此生成器确定控件是否正在访问在设计时通过设计器。When a control has this builder attached to it, the determines whether the control is being accessed at design-time through a designer. 返回的值属性，然后调用方法。The returns the value of the property, and then the method is called. 如果属性设置为`false`、引发。If the property is set to `false`, an is thrown. 否则，在返回该控件的内部文本调用。Otherwise, the inner text of the control is returned on the call. [!code-csharp[ControlBuilderSamples_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlBuilderSamples_3/cs/controlbuilder_samples3.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ControlBuilderSamples_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlBuilderSamples_3/VB/controlbuilder_samples3.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 此示例替代方法来检查属性来确定哪种类型的控件此生成器应用于。This example overrides the method to check the property to determine what type of control this builder is applied to. 如果它是`CustomTextBox`，生成器检查是否的值属性包含在控件中。If it is a `CustomTextBox`, the builder checks whether the value of the property is included in the control. 如果因此，将引发异常，否则调用方法。If so, an exception is thrown, if not the method is called. [!code-csharp[ControlBuilderSamples_4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlBuilderSamples_4/cs/controlbuilder_4.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ControlBuilderSamples_4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlBuilderSamples_4/VB/controlbuilder_4.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void ProcessGeneratedCode (System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit codeCompileUnit, System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration baseType, System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration derivedType, System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod buildMethod, System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod dataBindingMethod);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ProcessGeneratedCode(class System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit codeCompileUnit, class System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration baseType, class System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration derivedType, class System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod buildMethod, class System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod dataBindingMethod) cil managed

public: virtual void ProcessGeneratedCode(System::CodeDom::CodeCompileUnit ^ codeCompileUnit, System::CodeDom::CodeTypeDeclaration ^ baseType, System::CodeDom::CodeTypeDeclaration ^ derivedType, System::CodeDom::CodeMemberMethod ^ buildMethod, System::CodeDom::CodeMemberMethod ^ dataBindingMethod);

param.name: codeCompileUnit
param.span: 所生成控件的 CodeDOM 关系图的根容器。

span.span: The root container of a CodeDOM graph of the control that is being built.

param.name: baseType
param.span: 包含所生成控件的页面或用户控件的基类型。

span.span: The base type of the page or user control that contains the control that is being built.

param.name: derivedType
param.span: 包含所生成控件的页面或用户控件的派生类型。

span.span: The derived type of the page or user control that contains the control that is being built.

param.name: buildMethod
param.span: 用于生成控件的代码。

span.span: The code that is used to build the control.

param.name: dataBindingMethod
param.span: 用于生成控件的数据绑定方法的代码。

span.span: The code that is used to build the data-binding method of the control.

summary.span: 启用自定义控件生成器以访问生成的代码文档对象模型 (CodeDom)，并在分析和生成控件的过程中插入和修改代码。

span.span: Enables custom control builders to access the generated Code Document Object Model (CodeDom) and insert and modify code during the process of parsing and building controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在单文件页模型中，`baseType`和`derivedType`参数都是相同类型，通常派生自类。In the single-file page model, the `baseType` and `derivedType` parameters are the same type, which typically derives from the class. 在代码隐藏页模型中，`baseType`是表示部分的代码隐藏类，该类通常派生自类型类。In the code-behind page model, `baseType` is the type that represents the partial code-behind class, which is typically derived from the class. `derivedType`参数是派生自包含标记的分部类的类。The `derivedType` parameter is the class that derives from the partial class that contains the markup. 有关 ASP.NET Web 页模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页语法概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02)。For more information about ASP.NET Web page models, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Syntax Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/09074b20-ece9-46fa-bc8f-ab2595ed2c02). 有关如何使用 CodeDOM 表示并生成源代码的详细信息，请参阅[动态源代码生成和编译](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/dynamic-source-code-generation-and-compilation.md)。For more information about how to use the CodeDOM to represent and generate source code, see [Dynamic Source Code Generation and Compilation](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/dynamic-source-code-generation-and-compilation.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ThemeResolutionService As IThemeResolutionService
public: property System::Web::UI::IThemeResolutionService ^ ThemeResolutionService { System::Web::UI::IThemeResolutionService ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个 对象，该对象用于在设计时管理控件的主题和外观。

span.span: Gets an object that is used in design time to manage control themes and skins.

value.span: 一个 对象，该对象用于在设计时管理控件的主题和外观。

span.span: An object that is used in design time to manage control themes and skins.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口是一个或多个容器对象，反过来提供将主题应用和控件到控件的外观的设计器中创建的对象。The interface is a container for one or more objects, which in turn supply the objects that apply themes and control skins to controls when they are created in a designer.
